title: (WIP) Revenue Platform
description: Fullstack Application for Revenue data visualisation and reporting. Using a React FrontEnd and Django architecture with a Postgre DB on the BackEnd. My goal is to showcase a light version of the different apps and services I have been developing so far.

title: This Website :)
description: I always wanted to have a personal website, and now I have one! I built this website using Typescript and is deployed via Vercel. I used Next.js for the front-end. I am planning to add more features to this website in the future.

title: NETSUITE : SuiteScript RESTlet SavedSearch Utility
description: NetSuite RESTlet script designed to facilitate Saved Search data retrieval. The script allows users to specify the search ID, page size, and page number, ensuring they can fetch specific subsets of data from large saved search results.
